worklogs.comment:
kou commented on pull request #6696: ARROW-8191: [Packaging][APT] Fix cmake removal in Debian GNU/Linux Stretch
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6696
 
 
   Because cmake in stretch-backports requires newer libarchive13 but
   newer libarchive13 only exists in stretch-backports-sloppy.
